description.value: Your bonded world revives you. Add breath of life to your primal spell list. While on a bonded planet, if you cast @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Breath of Life] and target a member of your bond, @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Transfer Vitality] to restore Hit Points to the target. If you do, the target regains additional Hit Points equal to their level (without spending any Hit Points from your vitality network), if they also follow the edicts and anathema of Planetary Bond. If you are on a bonded planet, you can cast breath of life on yourself when you would die, even if you are @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Unconscious].
